name: Beat Rush
description:
Beat Rush is a musical racing game in which your goal is to catch as many points as possible, survive and upgrade your ship to the max.
You'll be in control of a space vessel capable of flying above a special platform that enables you to fly. You'll begin with a regular ship and work your way up by collecting blue points and using them to upgrade your vessel. The vessel's speed will increase by each beaten level. In the background of each level, you'll hear a different pumped-up electronic track.
In Beat Rush, your goal is to survive throughout the music track playing in the background.
You'll play with spaceships, which can be upgraded.
But it's not going to be that easy!
There will be obstacles spawning in your way. Colliding with them will cause damage to your ship. Too much damage and ... boooom.
You will also encounter what we call 'points'. They are shining conical objects.
They come in 3 colors, according to their function in the game.
All points replenish some of your health.
The blue ones are used as a currency in Beat Rush. You can spend them in the Shop.
The pink ones allow you to jump; 15 pink points = 1 jump.
The orange ones allow you to regenerate your shield, which you'll unlock with the 3rd ship in the Shop.
Each level will be more difficult than the previous one - more obstacles and higher speed.
Colliding with the walls on your sides also damages you - be careful while moving towards them!
